Module lanat
Package lanat.parsing.errors

Class ErrorContext

java.lang.Object
lanat.parsing.errors.ErrorContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParseErrorContext, TokenizeErrorContext
public abstract sealed class ErrorContext extends Object permits ParseErrorContext, TokenizeErrorContext
Base class for error contexts. Provides methods to easily get data about the context in which the error occurred. Such data includes the command that was being parsed, the absolute index of the error, the number of tokens in the command, etc.
